channel.title: Vim on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on David J Nevin

item.title: Vim as Python IDE
item.description: Vim setup: The never-ending story Joy! I’ve gotten my Python virtual environment set up, installed Flake8() and managed to trouble-shoot a problem with the Syntastic auto-running of Flake8() on save.

item.title: Vim Commands
item.description: Too Many Vim Commands Getting back into Vim again and decided this time to take it slower and get the basics well in place before I try and incorporate too many commands.
